Under what circumstances did the public employee have his/her employment unilaterally terminated by the public service provider?

choices.A: Public employees who have been assessed as failing to complete their tasks for 2 consecutive years
choices.B: Article 10.-Public employees who are sick or have accidents, or are being treated for occupational diseases under decisions of medical treatment establishments
choices.C: A public employee who is taking annual leave, leaves for personal reasons and other leaves permitted by the head of his/her public non-business unit
choices.D: Female official is pregnant, on maternity leave, raising child under 36 months old

text: What other types of travel services do the Tourism Law include? Choose the correct answer.

choices.A: Sports services.
choices.B: Food service.
choices.C: Health care.
choices.D: All three options.

text: Which of the following places is eligible for new permanent residence registration?

choices.A: - Houses already dismantled under decisions of competent State bodies.
choices.B: - The place of residence is confiscated under a decision of a competent state agency.
choices.C: Accommodation is located in unclassified historical - cultural monuments.
choices.D: The vehicle used as permanent residence has been deregistered.

text: The notice of retirement of public employees issued by the agency, unit or organization is made within a certain period of time before the time limit for public employee retirement is reached?

choices.A: 06 months
choices.B: 04 months
choices.C: 03 months
choices.D: 02 months

text: What are the following activities on the set?

choices.A: - Organizing the management and administration of, or joint venture or cooperation in, film production.
choices.B: To provide film production services and other services in accordance with law.
choices.C: Both A and B are right.
choices.D: Both A and B are wrong.

text: In any of the following cases, the language used in the legal proceedings is not Vietnamese?

choices.A: For a dispute involving foreign elements in which the parties cannot reach agreement on the language of procedures, the arbitration council shall decide to use Vietnamese.
choices.B: Disputes involving foreign elements and one of the parties cannot use Vietnamese and the parties agree to use English as the procedural language.
choices.C: a/Disputes involving no foreign elements and one of the involved parties cannot use Vietnamese.
choices.D: Disputes where at least one party is a foreign-invested enterprise and the parties agree to use Vietnamese as the procedural language.

text: Which of the following resources is being used for drug prevention and control?

choices.A: State budget
choices.B: - Financial assistance, aid, investment and donations from domestic and foreign organizations and individuals.
choices.C: Family expenses, drug addicts
choices.D: Both A, B, C are right.

text: What stages of the detox process are involved?

choices.A: Withdrawal therapy, detoxification, treatment of psychosis and other pathologies
choices.B: Education, Counseling, Behavior and Personality Rehabilitation
choices.C: Occupational therapy, vocational training, and community re-integration
choices.D: Both A, B, C are right.

text: How many levels of vocational education are being trained?

choices.A: Elementary and intermediate level
choices.B: College level
choices.C: Other vocational training programs for learners
choices.D: Both A, B, C are right.

text: What does the permanent residence registration dossier of a citizen who has a lawful place of residence under his/her ownership consist of?

choices.A: Declaration of change to residence information; papers and documents proving the housing area is sufficient for permanent residence registration as prescribed.
choices.B: Declaration of change to residence information; contract for lease, lending or permission for stay or document on lending or permission for stay at lawful place of residence notarized or certified as prescribed by law.
choices.C: Declaration of change in residence information; papers and documents proving the lawful ownership of place of residence.
choices.D: Declaration of change in residence information; papers and documents proving personal relationship with household members.

text: In what cases are the arbitrators entitled to settle the dispute?

choices.A: Disputes between parties arising from commercial activities
choices.B: Disputes arising between parties, of which at least one party conducts commercial activities.
choices.C: Other disputes between parties which are prescribed by law to be settled by arbitration
choices.D: All three options A, B, and C are correct.

text: The following acts are not prohibited from residence?

choices.A: Forging residence papers, documents and data; using fake residence papers, documents and data; supplying untruthful residence information, papers and documents.
choices.B: To exploit information on their residence in the national population database.
choices.C: To permit the permanent or temporary residence registration when it is clear that the permanent or temporary residence registrant does not live in the place.
choices.D: Making false declarations of conditions, forging dossiers, papers and documents to be registered as permanent or temporary residence; buying, selling, renting, leasing, borrowing, lending, pledging, receiving as pledge or destroying residence papers and documents.

text: What is not the role of the state in protecting marriage and family?

relevant_articles.law_id: Luật Hôn nhân và gia đình

choices.A: To establish voluntary, progressive, monogamous, equal husband and wife marriage.
choices.B: Build a prosperous, progressive, happy family and fulfill all of your functions.
choices.C: Prohibit the education of marriage and family legislation.
choices.D: To mobilize people to eliminate backward customs and practices on marriage and family.

text: Article 11.-What rights couple have in the possession, use and disposition of common property

relevant_articles.law_id: Luật Hôn nhân và gia đình

choices.A: Husband and wife reach an agreement
choices.B: Wife has a higher right than husband.
choices.C: Husband and wife have equal rights.
choices.D: Husband has a higher right than wife.

text: What is not the condition for a tour guide's license?

choices.A: - Having Vietnamese nationality and permanently residing in Vietnam.
choices.B: Have full legal capacity.
choices.C: Possessing a university or higher degree in accounting.
choices.D: No infectious diseases, no drug use.

text: What is not the responsibility of the registration authority?

choices.A: Certify information about residence, notify results of procedures for permanent residence registration, temporary residence registration, temporary residence extension, declaration of information, adjustment of information about residence, household separation, temporary absence declaration in writing, electronic messages or other forms as prescribed by the Minister of Public Security.
choices.B: Issue, print and manage declarations of change to residence information and residence documents, forms and records.
choices.C: Update information on citizens' residence to the national population database and residence database.
choices.D: To manage and archive residence registration and administration dossiers, papers and documents and keep confidential citizens' residence registration information.

text: Which unit has the power to license film classification?

choices.A: The Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism shall :
choices.B: Provincial People's Committees
choices.C: Provincial-level People's Committees shall satisfy the conditions prescribed by the Minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism.
choices.D: The Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism and provincial-level People's Committees shall satisfy the conditions prescribed by the Minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism.

text: It's not the duty, the right of the father or mother to directly raise a child after divorce

relevant_articles.law_id: Luật Hôn nhân và gia đình

choices.A: Respect your rights to live with... The direct nurturer.
choices.B: Supporting your child
choices.C: Abuse of visiting to obstruct or adversely affect the care, nurturing, and education of children
choices.D: Visit me without interference.

text: What are the conditions for arbitration?

choices.A: Parties have an arbitration agreement which may be made before or after the dispute arises.
choices.B: In case a party to an arbitration agreement being an individual dies or loses his/her act capacity, the arbitration agreement remains valid for his/her heir or at-law representative, unless otherwise agreed by the parties.
choices.C: In case a party to an arbitration agreement being an organization has to terminate its operation, go bankrupt, dissolve, consolidate, merge, divide, split up or transform its organization, the arbitration agreement remains valid for the organization that takes over its rights and obligations, unless otherwise agreed by the parties.
choices.D: All three of these are true.

text: In an arbitral proceedings, how can the parties negotiate and reconcile with each other?

choices.A: The parties may freely negotiate and reach agreement on the settlement of their dispute but may not request the arbitration council to conciliate them for agreement on the settlement of their dispute.
choices.B: The parties may freely negotiate and reach agreement on the settlement of their dispute or request the arbitration council to conciliate them for agreement on the settlement of their dispute.
choices.C: The parties have no right to negotiate or mediate with each other but must request the arbitration council to mediate so that they can reach agreement on the settlement of their dispute.
choices.D: The parties have no right to freely negotiate and conciliate nor to request the arbitration council to conciliate the parties to reach agreement on the settlement of their dispute.

text: How long does the registration authority have to appraise and update information about the household related to the separation into the residence database after receiving the complete and valid application?

choices.A: 05 working days.
choices.B: - 5 days, including weekends and holidays.
choices.C: 3 working days.
choices.D: - 03 days, including weekends and holidays.

text: Parents are NOT obliged to care for and support their children together.

relevant_articles.law_id: Luật Hôn nhân và gia đình

choices.A: Minor children
choices.B: You're a grown man and married.
choices.C: - The child is an adult but has lost his/her civil act capacity.
choices.D: I have no working capacity and no property to support myself.

text: What is a narcotic - containing plant?

choices.A: Opium poppy
choices.B: Coconut
choices.C: Cacao plants
choices.D: Both A, B, C are right.

text: Which of the following are covered by the applicable law on dispute resolution in the Law on Commercial Arbitration?

choices.A: For disputes involving no foreign elements, arbitration councils shall apply Vietnamese law to settle them.
choices.B: For a dispute involving foreign elements, the arbitration council shall apply the law selected by the parties. If the parties fail to reach agreement on the applicable law, the arbitration council shall decide to apply the law it deems most appropriate.
choices.C: In case Vietnamese law or a law selected by the parties does not provide specific provisions on the dispute, the arbitration council may apply international practices to settle the dispute if such application or consequences of such application are not contrary to basic principles of Vietnamese law.
choices.D: All three of these are true.

text: In what circumstances did the arbitration agreement become void?

choices.A: Disputes arise in the domains falling beyond the arbitration's jurisdiction specified in Article 2 of this Law.
choices.B: The arbitration agreement does not violate the prohibition of law.
choices.C: The form of an arbitration agreement complies with Article 16 of this Law.
choices.D: The arbitration agreement maker is a competent person defined by law.

text: Is the arbitration agreement independent of the contract?

choices.A: An arbitration agreement is independent of the contract. The modification, extension or cancellation of a contract or the invalid or unrealizable contract does not invalidate the arbitration agreement.
choices.B: An arbitration agreement is not independent of the contract. The modification or extension of the contract invalidates the arbitration agreement.
choices.C: An arbitration agreement is not independent of the contract. The cancellation of a contract or the invalidation or impossibility of the performance of a contract invalidates the arbitration agreement.
choices.D: An arbitration agreement depends on the contract. Any act of changing, extending or canceling the contract or invalidating or being unable to perform the contract will invalidate the arbitration agreement.

text: What is psychotropic substances defined?

choices.A: Psychotropic substances are neurotoxic.
choices.B: Psychotropic substances are substances that stimulate or inhibit nerves or hallucinations, and repeated use can lead to addiction for the user.
choices.C: Psychotropic substances are nerve agents.
choices.D: Both A, B, C are wrong.

text: Does not the application for rating of the tourist accommodation establishment include?

choices.A: An application form for rating of a tourist accommodation establishment, which is made using the form provided by the Minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism.
choices.B: - The list of relatives of the tourist accommodation establishment's personnel.
choices.C: The written self-assessment of the quality of the tourist accommodation establishment according to the national standards on rating of tourist accommodation establishments.
choices.D: - The list of managers and employees of the tourist accommodation establishment.

text: In what cases, the public service provider is allowed to unilaterally terminate the employment contract with the public employee?

choices.A: Public employee received disciplinary form of reprimand
choices.B: Female official is pregnant, on maternity leave, raising child under 36 months old
choices.C: Public non-business units terminate their operation under decisions of competent agencies
choices.D: A public employee who is taking annual leave, leaves for personal reasons and other leaves permitted by the head of his/her public non-business unit

text: What is the operating principle of the Tourism Development Assistance Fund not including below?

choices.A: Not for profit; preserve charter capital and self-cover management costs.
choices.B: To conduct revenues, expenditures, final settlement, publicity of finance, assets and accounting work according to law provisions.
choices.C: To submit to the examination, inspection and audit by the finance state management agency and the state audit of financial activities of the Tourism Development Assistance Fund.
choices.D: The previous year's fund balance of the Tourism Development Assistance Fund may be used for personal purposes at one's own will.

text: - Where is the competent unit to set up the film evaluation and classification council?

choices.A: The Minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism
choices.B: Chairpersons of provincial-level People's Committees
choices.C: Article 10.-The heads of the press bodies with television operation licenses
choices.D: All three of them, A, B, and C, are true.

text: What is the purpose of the Motion Picture Development Assistance Fund?

choices.A: Supporting experimental film production projects, debut films, films of young authors.
choices.B: To support film authors, film production projects and outstanding Vietnamese films participating in overseas film festivals, film prizes, film contests, film fairs, film programs and film weeks.
choices.C: Both A, B, D are right.
choices.D: Support other activities to develop the film.

text: Under the Tourism Law on the responsibility for State management over tourism, the People's Committees of all levels shall have no following tasks and powers :

choices.A: - To receive and settle tourist petitions;
choices.B: Taking advantage of tourist activities to illegally take people from Vietnam abroad or vice versa.
choices.C: - To manage tourist resources, tourist resorts, tourist sites, tourist business activities and tourist guides in their respective localities;
choices.D: To propagate and raise people's awareness to ensure a friendly, healthy and civilized tourist environment;

text: What's an arbitration union?

choices.A: An arbitration association is a socio-professional organization of arbitrators and arbitration centers in each province or city.
choices.B: An arbitration association is a socio-professional organization of arbitrators and arbitration centers nationwide.
choices.C: An arbitration association is a socio - professional organization of procurators and arbitration centers nationwide.
choices.D: An arbitration association is a socio-professional organization of arbitrators and people's courts nationwide.

text: What are the following prohibited acts?

relevant_articles.law_id: Luật Hôn nhân và gia đình

choices.A: Forced divorce, deception of divorce, obstruction of divorce.
choices.B: Claiming to be rich in marriage.
choices.C: Have a commercial assisted reproductive technology birth.
choices.D: All three of them, A, B, and C, are true.

text: What areas should be allocated in a public drug rehabilitation center?

choices.A: Temporary accommodation
choices.B: Compulsory drug rehab
choices.C: Voluntary drug rehabilitation
choices.D: Both A, B, C are right.

text: In any of the following cases, the applicant may not register permanent residence at a folk religious establishment or religious establishment with housing as an auxiliary work :

choices.A: Persons who are permitted by the representative (s) or the management of the folk religious establishment to register their permanent residence to directly manage and organize folk belief activities at the folk religious establishment.
choices.B: - The representative of the religious establishment.
choices.C: People who work for religious institutions.
choices.D: All three choices A, B, C.

text: What is the objective of vocational education?

choices.A: - Training of personnel directly engaged in production, business and services.
choices.B: Facilitating learners who complete courses to find jobs or take higher education
choices.C: Both A and B are right.
choices.D: Both A and B are wrong.

text: What is the mission of continuing education?

choices.A: To implement illiteracy eradication for persons in the age group as prescribed by law
choices.B: Creating opportunities for people with learning needs to improve their educational level
choices.C: Both A and B are right.
choices.D: Both A and B are wrong.

text: What are the following drug withdrawal measures?

choices.A: Voluntary drug rehabilitation
choices.B: Compulsory drug rehabilitation
choices.C: Both A and B are right.
choices.D: Both A and B are wrong.

text: In case the parties do not otherwise agree or the arbitration center's rules of proceedings do not otherwise prescribe, how long shall the arbitration center send to the defendant copies of the plaintiff's lawsuit petition and other prescribed documents after receiving the lawsuit petition?
How big is the size of the application for the reissuance of the tour guide card?
The time limit for managing the illegal drug users from the date the President of the People's Committee of commune or ward issues the management decision?
What is the function of the arbitration center?
answer: To organize and coordinate dispute settlement by statute arbitration and provide administrative, office and other supports for arbitrators in the course of arbitral proceedings.

text: After the household registration book expires (by December 31,2022 ), how can the permanent residence be proved?
answer: Citizens only need to present ID cards/Citizen Identification Cards, competent authorities shall search for information about residence in the national database system.
